description: Conformance configuration — defines which DTOs are implemented and which fields are explicitly excepted. The conformance test validates API responses against the original OpenAPI spec and fails on any field not in the spec (extra) or missing without an exception.

exceptions.fedTotalWholesalePopulation: no SS equivalent — SF-only wholesale population tracking
exceptions.fedDirectWholesalePopulation: no SS equivalent — SF-only wholesale population tracking
exceptions.fedIndirectWholesalePopulation: no SS equivalent — SF-only wholesale population tracking
exceptions.opInd: not yet mapped — operating period indicator
exceptions.opBeginDt: not yet mapped — operating period begin date
exceptions.opEndDt: not yet mapped — operating period end date
exceptions.dmsStagingData: SF internal — DMS transient staging field
exceptions.removeLanId: no SS equivalent — SF-only remove tracking
exceptions.removeDt: no SS equivalent — SF-only remove tracking
exceptions.lastReportedToFedDt: no SS equivalent — SF federal reporting timestamp
exceptions.dwpWaterSystemAnnualOperatingPeriods: nested array — separate entity, future phase
exceptions.geographicAreas: nested array — separate entity, future phase
exceptions.dwpWSServiceArea: nested object — service area, future phase

exceptions.location: nested object — DWPFacilityLocationDTO, separate SS columns, future phase
exceptions.facilityWell: nested object — DWPFacilityWellDTO, separate SS columns, future phase
exceptions.facilityStorage: nested object — DWPFacilityStorageDTO, separate SS columns, future phase
exceptions.treatmentPlant: nested object — DWPTreatmentPlantDTO, separate SS columns, future phase
exceptions.pocs: nested array — legal entity POCs, future phase
exceptions.facilityAnnualOperatingPeriods: nested array — separate entity, future phase
